Only lasts 20 minutes but I turn it right back on LOL. I will usually be sore the day after using it but it's because I keep turning it on over and over all day long. The soreness of my skin is nothing compared to my back pain from sitting in a chair all day coupled with my 1 hour commute to work. Recommend!

It may really depend on what style your seats are but in my mother's 09 Honda Civic, it actually causes discomfort. It's a great product and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: So in love with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic lower back pain, and spasms for nearly 7 months now. I had been looking for a serious relief solution anywhere and everywhere, and came across this pillow one day. At first o thought the price was a little much but you get what you pay for. With the added heat to the massage my muscles feel soothed as the massage is taking place. The massager itself bruised my back after a long massage session but I have read that is a good sign and when the bruising subsides it’s time for another massage, I found to be true. so worth my money, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: This is STRONG!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this since Christmas and use it almost every day. It is SUPER strong. The first time we had it, my husband and I used it all day and the next day our backs had bruises ALL OVER! It was crazy! So don't do that!! Now I just do one session with no bruising! It really gets your back nice and deep. When I was breastfeeding, I kept it in my glider and it make late night feedings even more relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith B.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a massager thinking it wouldn't really help with my back pain. I've had chronic lower back pain for over 10 years. I'm glad I did though! While it doesn't treat the cause of my back pain, it is a great relief for my muscle stiffness. I like it better than the creams and TENS units I've tried in the past. I also love that is has a car adapter because long trips normally involve more pain for me. I'd recommend everyone to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.text: God, this product is orgasmic to your back and shoulder muscles, but this product simply cannot withstand strong pressure against it. I noticed a grinding sound about a month in but didn't really consider it to be a forewarning of something worse to come. Within another month, the balls stopped rotating. Unfortunately I was idiotic and recycled the box and 1 year warranty as my Amazon packages were piling up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I’ve bought 3!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I bought more than a year ago. That rotating balls alternate directions and are great massage from neck to feet depending where you place it. I bought one for dear mom who claims she got rid of cramps she had I’m feet for 2 years!! Bought for sister and her family on a ski trip and that thing is running 24/7. Kids and parents love to sit with it and share for hours. Wholeheartedly recommended
customer_reviews.author: lliam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent massage for chronic back pain
customer_reviews.text: My husband has chronic lower back pain that has yet to be alleviated by anyone in the medical community. I gave him this massager for Christmas this year, and it has been a life-saver for him. He uses it almost daily and credits this massager with keeping him pain-free. (I've used the massager a bit, and while I like it, I sometimes find the pressure of the massage to be too much for me.) At this point, we're at 6 months of close to daily use and have had no issues with our unit at all. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just  Another Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Provides relief to the painful knots in my neck, back and shoulder!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but here are some key points. 1. You should have fabric between your skin and the unit or you might get a blister from the rubbing as I did. 2. Don't apply too much pressure or it may break. I placed it under my back and laid on it and it makes a funny noise. 3. It automatically shuts off after 20 minutes. Let it cool down for 10 minutes or so before using it again or it will stop working for more than an hour. It has unravelled the knots in my neck, shoulders and mid back. I use it while watching TV on my recliner, then I stretch. WOW! Save money on massage therapists !
customer_reviews.author: Mo M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I am adding my comments since there are over 8,000 reviews on this item, except that it has really changed my life for the better. I am a gardener and as such I do heavy lifting, digging, etc. I am constantly pulling a muscle or just plain overworking. In addition to that, I have osteoarthritis and sciatica that cause hip and back pain. This Shiatsu massager has made so much difference. It takes away all the aches and pains of the day. I am sleeping better and feeling better than I have in a long time. Get one immediately. Suffer no more.
customer_reviews.author: mallory0405

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager. I have terrible, chronic lower back & neck pain; using this for 20 min's, in each area/day, has definitely helped. PT is also amazing; this is an awesome "supplement". I highly recommend it. Just for context, I have sciatic pain, & a form of thoracic outlet syndrome. I am 51, see a massage therapist & a chiropractor regularly. Also, my 2 athletic children love using it!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah M

customer_reviews.title: This is my  second time purchasing this
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these 2 years ago and my fiance uses it constantly, so much so that I ended up getting another recently because the motor was starting to wear down and make this weird clicking sound (the sound of it struggling to keep going). He uses it on/under his legs though which I suspect might put more pressure on it than originally designed for. Either way, he loves this thing and has gotten so much use out of it that I didn't mind buying him a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have frequent neck and back (mainly lower back and in between my shoulders) so this seemed perfect for the job. It was not, at least for me. It didn't rub anywhere on my neck when I tried it there, it felt like 4 rocks were just going in circles when I put it further down my back and it was pinching my middle back when placed there. It did feel good on my lower back, in one very specific spot. Any higher or lower and it would hurt. I guess I dont have enough meat on my bones or I'm not wide enough for it to feel good pretty much anywhere on my body.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has chronic low back pain. I simply cannot recommend this highly enough. He used it for the first time last night and it gave him a tremendous amount of relief. So much so that he cancelled his appointment with his chiropractor for tomorrow. He used it this morning to get rid of some leftover stiffness from sleeping last night and it worked wonders. Anyone who suffers from chronic back pain should buy this - one can always send it back but I doubt anyone will.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Rubs me the right way
customer_reviews.text: Having had several different Shiatsu Pillow Massagers over the years, I my hopes weren't high. But, the price was right, and my last one broke down, so I gave it a try. It's effective, and doesn't "stall out" even with a fair amount of pressure. It's much lighter than others I've purchased over the years. Having used it for a couple of months now, I hope it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Portland Fella

customer_reviews.title: A personal massage therapist.
customer_reviews.text: The Zyllion Back and Neck Massager is one of the best purchases I have ever made. Massage with optional heat. The four rotating massaging heads are rounded and slightly squared off like fingers or knuckles. It changes direction every so often and feels like a professional masseuse. You can adjust the pressure by how hard you lean against it. No appointments or great expense. If you choose to use the heat function, it shuts off automatically after a while so it doesn’t overheat. It’s quiet and very relaxing and soothing. Very helpful for pain relief and very portable as well. I’m sold. Yes, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Trauer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 Month then BROKE
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this , it lasted a little over one month . The red light is on but the motor stopped moving .It is past the return date , I feel ripped off . It really worked well , but hey , breaking after a month! is not acceptable . I'm calling the number they list and will return to let people know what happened. 5 stars for everything except that it broke so soon , one mpnth , I can't believe it !
customer_reviews.author: billy freeze

customer_reviews.title: Save $6000 on a Massage Chair
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a $6,000 massage chair but space and price were impediments. This device quenched my desire to splurge. I'm sending them out as holiday and birthday gifts because they are just great. When you are watching TV or sitting in the living room or doing yoga on the floor you can find all sorts of places that it can massage. It lasts longer and is more powerful that human fingers. You will not be disappointed. Hey, where can I buy stock in this baby?
customer_reviews.author: Borami Schwartz

customer_reviews.text: I use this all over my body. It's a little odd but if I tweak my body just right I'm able to hit some places that I believe need some relief. This bad boy provides a good amount of pressure, the heat feels nice, and I'm confident that this bad boy will help me make some strides in loosening up my muscles and preventing/alleviating pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!!  You will absolutely ❤️It.

Thank you again for the excellent customer service, I will certainly purchase Zyllion products in the future!!

I highly recommend this company as well as their product.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good if you can wriggle. If you don't break it. It's iffy..
customer_reviews.text: They are prone to breaking. But they're like heaven if you've got a ton of knotted tissue on your back like me. customer_reviews.author: G-wiz

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhh....
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a miracle worker. I was shopping around and saw a review that said "don't think, just buy it," so I did. Best decision I made that week. The balls heat up, and it feels wonderful. I start at the bottom and move it up every couple minutes. It did feel a little harsh when I used it a couple days in a row, but as they say, too much of a good thing...Now I use it 2-3 times per week, and it doesn't disappoint. My husband is also a huge fan, and he's hard to please. Seriously, if you're looking for something like this, buy this one. Just do it. You will be so glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Begley

customer_reviews.title: Not inexpensive, but well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Most health-related products are way overpriced and don't deliver the results they promise. Not this one. It truly feels like you're getting a massage at a PT session. My issue is my lower back, and the massaging balls give such a deep massage that I have to use a pad, or they will be massaging my kidneys! And it's quiet to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver- no exaggeration
customer_reviews.text: I’m a grad student who’s under a tremendous amount of academic / work stress daily. My shoulders get very tense and by the end of the week it starts to feel really uncomfortable. I use this for 1-2 sessions (20-40 min) lying down on a carpet, focusing on sore muscles on the upper back while still covering from neck to tailbone area. It hurts so good and soon eliminates the discomfort completely. Voila! I’m good as new. Learn to tweak your position & add some weight on top or a pillow under the body if needed for deep tissue massage. This will get me through my Ph.D, it deserves its own diploma.
customer_reviews.author: Inhye Jang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: This back massager is so fantastic that I've since purchased four additional as gifts for family members and friends. You don't see customer service like that much anymore. Don't hesitate to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Zyllion Customer Service Hits it out of the Park!
customer_reviews.text: WOW what a great product! OK, so in February 2019 I bought one....loved it so much I bought another one for my sister then bought another one as a back up because I use it everyday for tight lower back muscles....the first one started to malfunction so I called and Zyllion Customer Service sent me a new one no questions no hassles just straight up great service like the old days....so rare these days do we see companies that stand behind their products like this company does. Good experience!
customer_reviews.author: A. fanto

But It was impossible to tell the massage therapist the exact points and by the time they found a pain point, there wasn’t enough time for them to spend on it. This product solves both those issues and for pennies compared to the thousands I’ve spent on massages. This product is tops. It’s right up there with the spoon and the wheel. Simply a must have. Good for every part on your body. Nothing is better than Netflix and self directed shiatsu massage with this thing.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gifts to myself and at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my very best gifts to myself. Excellent and relieving of upper and lower neck tension. It’s warming heat and massaging gives me some relaxing and decompression while I lay in bed and winding down. Best present to myself with tension! It’s great for mid to lower back pain as well. You’ll learn to adjust it at many different levels of the body.

customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great product had it fit all neck sizes, as weird as that sounds! I am a smaller framed person and the massage roller balls did not fit my neck and massage at the pressure points. It became very uncomfortable and a bit painful when I tried to use it. It also did not fit properly on the head rest in my Acadia. I guess due to the style of head rest I have, it would point down. Unfortunately this product was of no use to me. The refund and return was issued promptly so five stars on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: What a life saver for this caregiver
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, no more trips to the chiropractor or masseuse for a massage. Like the product says, if you are too tender to take the strength of the pulse, just put a thin blanket or something between it and you to soften the mechanism to a more comfortable level. I am a daily caregiver and this has become a necessity for relief from tired, achy muscles. Usually within a minute or two my back pops back in place! And within the comfort of my home without worrying about catching covid!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 13

customer_reviews.title: A must by!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pillow massager for a great price and exceptional customer service. I read reviews that the cover may rip but after considering what one massage costs plus a gratuity I will be very satisfied if this unit last four months. Even if I have to buy one every four months it is still worth the money. Also, considering the exceptional customer service, if my cover does rip I will first inquire if I can purchase a replacement cover at a reasonable price before I replace the unit. Definitely worth buying this item.

I haven't had any problems with it getting too hot like other people have said and my kids (7 &10) have used it.
